data.text: (א) Blessed are the undefiled in the way,
(א) Blessed are they that keep his testimonies,
(א) They also do no iniquity:
(א) Thou hast commanded us
(א) O that my ways were directed
(א) Then shall I not be ashamed,
(א) I will praise thee with uprightness of heart,
(א) I will keep thy statutes:
(ב) Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way?
(ב) With my whole heart have I sought thee:
(ב) Thy word have I hid in mine heart,
(ב) Blessed art thou, O Lord:
(ב) With my lips have I declared
(ב) I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies,
(ב) I will meditate in thy precepts,
(ב) I will delight myself in thy statutes:
(ג) Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live,
(ג) Open thou mine eyes,
(ג) I am a stranger in the earth:
(ג) My soul breaketh for the longing
(ג) Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed,
(ג) Remove from me reproach and contempt;
(ג) Princes also did sit and speak against me:
(ג) Thy testimonies also are my delight
(ד) My soul cleaveth unto the dust:
(ד) I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me:
(ד) Make me to understand the way of thy precepts:
(ד) My soul melteth for heaviness:
(ד) Remove from me the way of lying:
(ד) I have chosen the way of truth:
(ד) I have stuck unto thy testimonies:
(ד) I will run the way of thy commandments,
(ה) Teach me, O Lord, the way of thy statutes;
(ה) Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law;
(ה) Make me to go in the path of thy commandments;
(ה) Incline my heart unto thy testimonies,
(ה) Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity;
(ה) Stablish thy word unto thy servant,
(ה) Turn away my reproach which I fear:
(ה) Behold, I have longed after thy precepts:
(ו) Let thy mercies come also unto me, O Lord,
(ו) So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me:
(ו) And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth;
(ו) So shall I keep thy law continually
(ו) And I will walk at liberty:
(ו) I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings,
(ו) And I will delight myself in thy commandments,
(ו) My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved;
(ז) Remember the word unto thy servant,
(ז) This is my comfort in my affliction:
(ז) The proud have had me greatly in derision:
(ז) I remembered thy judgments of old, O Lord;
(ז) Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked
(ז) Thy statutes have been my songs
(ז) I have remembered thy name, O Lord, in the night,
(ז) This I had,
(ח) Thou art my portion, O Lord:
(ח) I intreated thy favour with my whole heart:
(ח) I thought on my ways,
(ח) I made haste, and delayed not
(ח) The bands of the wicked have robbed me:
(ח) At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee
(ח) I am a companion of all them that fear thee,
(ח) The earth, O Lord, is full of thy mercy:
(ט) Thou hast dealt well with thy servant,
(ט) Teach me good judgment and knowledge:
(ט) Before I was afflicted I went astray:
(ט) Thou art good, and doest good; Teach me thy statutes.
(ט) The proud have forged a lie against me:
(ט) Their heart is as fat as grease;
(ט) It is good for me that I have been afflicted;
(ט) The law of thy mouth is better unto me
(י) Thy hands have made me and fashioned me:
(י) They that fear thee will be glad when they see me;
(י) I know, O Lord, that thy judgments are right,
(י) Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort,
(י) Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live:
(י) Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause:
(י) Let those that fear thee turn unto me,
(י) Let my heart be sound in thy statutes;
(כ) My soul fainteth for thy salvation:
(כ) Mine eyes fail for thy word,
(כ) For I am become like a bottle in the smoke;
(כ) How many are the days of thy servant?
(כ) The proud have digged pits for me,
(כ) All thy commandments are faithful:
(כ) They had almost consumed me upon earth;
(כ) Quicken me after thy lovingkindness;
(ל) For ever, O Lord,
(ל) Thy faithfulness is unto all generations:
(ל) They continue this day according to thine ordinances:
(ל) Unless thy law had been my delights,
(ל) I will never forget thy precepts:
(ל) I am thine, save me;
(ל) The wicked have waited for me to destroy me:
(ל) I have seen an end of all perfection:
(מ) O how love I thy law!
(מ) Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies:
(מ) I have more understanding than all my teachers:
(מ) I understand more than the ancients,
(מ) I have refrained my feet from every evil way,
(מ) I have not departed from thy judgments:
(מ) How sweet are thy words unto my taste!
(מ) Through thy precepts I get understanding:
(נ) Thy word is a lamp unto my feet,
(נ) I have sworn, and I will perform it,
(נ) I am afflicted very much:
(נ) Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O Lord,
(נ) My soul is continually in my hand:
(נ) The wicked have laid a snare for me:
(נ) Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever:
(נ) I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes
(ס) I hate vain thoughts:
(ס) Thou art my hiding place and my shield:
(ס) Depart from me, ye evildoers:
(ס) Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live:
(ס) Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe:
(ס) Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes:
(ס) Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross:
(ס) My flesh trembleth for fear of thee;
(ע) I have done judgment and justice:
(ע) Be surety for thy servant for good:
(ע) Mine eyes fail for thy salvation,
(ע) Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy,
(ע) I am thy servant; give me understanding,
(ע) It is time for thee, Lord, to work:
(ע) Therefore I love thy commandments
(ע) Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right;
(פ) Thy testimonies are wonderful:
(פ) The entrance of thy words giveth light;
(פ) I opened my mouth, and panted:
(פ) Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me,
(פ) Order my steps in thy word:
(פ) Deliver me from the oppression of man:
(פ) Make thy face to shine upon thy servant;
(פ) Rivers of waters run down mine eyes,
(צ) Righteous art thou, O Lord, And upright are thy judgments.
(צ) Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous
(צ) My zeal hath consumed me,
(צ) Thy word is very pure:
(צ) I am small and despised:
(צ) Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness,
(צ) Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me:
(צ) The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting:
(ק) I cried with my whole heart;
(ק) I cried unto thee; save me,
(ק) I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried:
(ק) Mine eyes prevent the night watches,
(ק) Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness:
(ק) They draw nigh that follow after mischief:
(ק) Thou art near, O Lord;
(ק) Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old
(ר) Consider mine affliction, and deliver me:
(ר) Plead my cause, and deliver me:
(ר) Salvation is far from the wicked:
(ר) Great are thy tender mercies, O Lord:
(ר) Many are my persecutors and mine enemies;
(ר) I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved;
(ר) Consider how I love thy precepts:
(ר) Thy word is true from the beginning:
(ש) Princes have persecuted me without a cause:
(ש) I rejoice at thy word,
(ש) I hate and abhor lying:
(ש) Seven times a day do I praise thee
(ש) Great peace have they which love thy law:
(ש) Lord, I have hoped for thy salvation,
(ש) My soul hath kept thy testimonies;
(ש) I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies:
(ת) Let my cry come near before thee, O Lord:
(ת) Let my supplication come before thee:
(ת) My lips shall utter praise,
(ת) My tongue shall speak of thy word:
(ת) Let thine hand help me;
(ת) I have longed for thy salvation, O Lord;
(ת) Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee;
(ת) I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant;
